module.name: ps_eventbus
module.description: Link your PrestaShop account to synchronize your shop data to a tech partner of your choice. Do not uninstall this module if you are already using a service, as it will prevent it from working.
module.author: PrestaShop
module.confirmUninstall: This action will immediately prevent your PrestaShop services and Community services from working as they are using PrestaShop CloudSync for syncing.
